message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can work out a better deal later if you're not happy with this.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is fairer.  Let's be reasonable, and we can get this done quickly.
Okay, let's try an even split.  This is the last offer I'll make with a 50/50 split, after this I'm going to prioritize getting the most value for myself.
